abstract: blockchain-based platform that allows the sale of anonymous data to developers .
article: what is a repux ? repux is a special protocol-level system that uses block chain technology to sort the corresponding dile between fixed data on different types , different institutional structures and individual users , and to modify them when necessary . the most efficient feature of the repux protocol is to incorporate a variety of decentralized documented block technologies such as sia , ethereal , eos , and others to provide high-level block creation services to its users . by essentially making the flow of data and information between these systems easy and feasible , the application authors who compose and use this data provide data sharing in the existing market environment .

our protocol does not require intermediaries in the process of sending this data , vision and goals of repuxas a repux , we have a vision to improve the reputation of data security and reputation . bringing a new breath to the requirements and data transfer system by creating a secure protocol between those who generate , collect , and use data ; this is to deliver significant results to your business . thanks to the protocol we have created , data manufacturers can easily access this data to end users and app users thanks to token repux . we will also make token repux , which can be used as a tool during various transactions in various industries , and can be used for the purchase or replacement of products and services .

as the reputation and usage of the repux protocols increases , the value of the coins will also increase and we will add additional added value to this . troubleshooting analysis repuxthe problem is : companies that handle advanced technology store large amounts of data in their systems , and they experience some problems in the use and transfer process . this issue causes serious loss of time and money for businesses . solution : with the repux protocol , data exchange between various businesses and users can be easily achieved and money left in your pocket . by combining several decentralized technologies under a single protocol , an efficient and lossless block chain can be unified to create perfect data exchange and market transfers .
